<cr> <cr> <cr> <cr> delivered using IMRT. Gross tumor volume ( GTV ) was all known disease including imaging proven nodal disease. The primary planning target volume ( PTV1 ) included the GTV with 2 - to 3 - cm margins in all directions as well as potential nodal involvement. Secondary planning target volume ( PTV2 ) included the GTV with 1 - to 1.5 - cm margins on all sides including proven nodal involvement. Tertiary planning treatment volume ( PTV3 ) included the area of the GTV adjacent to the vascular structures specifically the mesenteric and portal vessels with a 0.5 - cm margin. The prescription dose delivered to PTV3 was 54 Gy in 28 fractions. Synchronously , PTV1 and PTV2 received 45 and 50.4 Gy , respectively .
